Name of resource: Toxic Substances Control Act (TSCA) Chemical Substance Inventory
Type(s) of content in package: Decades of reports from manufacturers, processors and importers of chemical substances manufactured, processed, imported into the US. This is the public version, thus excluding chemical identities labeled as confidential.
recommended_approach: There are links to Microsoft Access and CSV versions of the files from the latest inventory. I do not know where the historical data are.
significance: Decades of reports from manufacturers, processors and importers of chemical substances manufactured, processed, imported into the US. This is the public version, thus excluding chemical identities labeled as confidential.
title: Toxic Substances Control Act (TSCA) Chemical Substance Inventory
